title: Constant terrible ping!
body:
I use a laptop to play league of legends. I know it's not the best, but it hasn't failed me much so far, until just recently. The past two weeks, I've been spiking from 100, to 300, to 600 or even 900 ping consistently. I've never had that problem before. I've been using Razor's game booster for a good while now too, and yet this problem still continues for days. I've tried uninstalling things, customizing the boosting process Razor takes, etc etc. Nothing. I'm no computer whiz, though, so here are my specs are below.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're having some packet loss issues which can cause your ping to skyrocket like that suddenly.  I've been seeing a lot of game boosters lately, and I just want to start off by suggesting to disable any third party programs- just while troubleshooting.  
This can help with ruling out possibilities.  

A laptop shouldn't really impact your connection unless your ethernet card is going bad (I've gone through 2).  Go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up, and test it in a custom game.

Let me know if all that helps!

Wow, that was a quick response, thanks!
I ran the Hextech Repair Tool. It says 4 packets were sent, 4 received, and 0% packetloss, so I guess that's out of the question. It also says my ping is in the 28-38ms range at the moment, so I guess it really may just be Razor after all. That's strange, it did good for me a couple months ago... oh well! 

I went ahead and tested avoiding using Razor through a custom and things seemed well, so I went ahead and jumped into ranked, and they were all fine for the most part. Thanks! I'll definitely be uninstalling Razor now.
